title: Bigger than Texas
creator_credit: Mark Pugh, Hugh Burton and Victorian College of the Arts
brief_description: During a bank hold-up the robber and one of his victims strike up an unlikely rapport. An ‘almost’ love story about the chance meeting of two misfits in search of escape routes from their sordid lives. The music and Pugh’s photography propel these intriguing characters through a world of surreal suspense.
